amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the Water Power program by $9 million and reduces funding for Departmental Administration by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funds for energy efficiency and renewable energy programs by $9 million and reduce funds for the Departmental Administration account of the Department of Energy by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bonamici amendment (A024) Agreed to by recorded vote: 221 - 199 (Roll no. 380).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Bonamici amendment (A024) Agreed to by recorded vote: 221 - 199 (Roll no. 380).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A024) offered by Ms. Bonamici.
